data.name: Rainbow Billy: The Curse of the Leviathan Demo
data.detailed_description:
THE CURSE OF THE LEVIATHAN
While Billy and friends are preparing the Color Festival Parade, the Mighty Leviathan arises to curse the world into monochromatic chaos!



EXPLORE
From dark caverns on secret islands to hidden coves off in the stormy seas, explore a rich world filled with treasure, friendship and... danger!



SOLVE
Each world is filled with intricate color puzzles and secrets that unlock new areas to explore!



BEFRIEND
Befriend strange creatures you'll encounter in your journey in order to create your own unique team!



RECOLOR
Bring back the lost colors of the world by confronting colorless creatures!

Features


  • Aesthetic: As great fans of cartoons from the 1930s and anime, we wanted to combine these art styles along with the 2.5D aspect in order to bring our world to life!
  • Collection: The world is filled with 60+ creatures, friends and foes alike! Create your own unique team in order to conquer the seas! Will you be able to find them all?
  • Color: With our in-house shader we can bring back, color by color, any visual asset in 2D or 3D in the game! We also use colors in new and innovative ways in our puzzles and combat!
  • Fishing: Everyone knows that great games always have a fishing mini-game!
data.about_the_game:
THE CURSE OF THE LEVIATHAN
While Billy and friends are preparing the Color Festival Parade, the Mighty Leviathan arises to curse the world into monochromatic chaos!

From dark caverns on secret islands to hidden coves off in the stormy seas, explore a rich world filled with treasure, friendship and... danger!

RECOLOR
Bring back the lost colors of the world by confronting colorless creatures!

Features


  • Aesthetic: As great fans of cartoons from the 1930s and anime, we wanted to combine these art styles along with the 2.5D aspect in order to bring our world to life!
  • Collection: The world is filled with 60+ creatures, friends and foes alike! Create your own unique team in order to conquer the seas! Will you be able to find them all?
  • Color: With our in-house shader we can bring back, color by color, any visual asset in 2D or 3D in the game! We also use colors in new and innovative ways in our puzzles and combat!
  • Fishing: Everyone knows that great games always have a fishing mini-game!
data.short_description: Rainbow Billy: The Curse of the Leviathan is a creature capture, adventure-RPG in 2.5D inspired by modern cartoons in which you must save whimsical creatures by bringing back color to the world you once knew!

fullgame.name: Rainbow Billy: The Curse of the Leviathan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible, 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible, 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible
